local battle_components = require(helper.path.battle_components)

local super = require(helper.path.battle_skill .. 'behavior/base_behavior')

---@class behavior_freeze_battle : base_behavior
local behavior_freeze_battle = class("behavior_freeze_battle", super)

---构造函数
---@protected
function behavior_freeze_battle:ctor()
    super.ctor(self, self.cname)
end

---行为开始，根据配置延迟后开始
---@protected
function behavior_freeze_battle:on_start()
    ---@type freeze_frame_config
    local data = self.behavior_data.behavior_args.FreezeFrameConfigData

    local skill_entity = self.context:get_unique_component(battle_components.skill_entity)
    if not skill_entity:has_component(battle_components.freeze_battle) then
        skill_entity:add_component(battle_components.freeze_battle, data.Duration, data.TimeScale)
    end
end

return behavior_freeze_battle
